title: Microsoft has reportedly cancelled the HoloLens 3 and doesnâ€™t know what to do with AR
content:
Microsoft’s AR efforts seem to be misguided and the future of the HoloLens augmented reality (AR) headsets is uncertain. According to a report by Business Insider, Microsoft has cancelled plans to release the would-be HoloLens 3. The report cites sources inside Microsoft, with one specifically saying this may be the end of the road for

The post Microsoft has reportedly cancelled the HoloLens 3 and doesn’t know what to do with AR appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft may have scrapped its plans for a would-be HoloLens 3 AR headset, according to a report that says the company's vision is unclear.
